leads.lead_text: Inflorescence finally open and spreading with capillary branches
Most spikelets with pedicels less than twice as long as glumes
Most spikelets with pedicels at least twice the length of the glumes
Spikelets mostly more than 2.2 mm long; glumes acute; both florets awned
Spikelets mostly less than 2.2 mm long; glume(s) often more or less obtuse with central part exserted as a short point; lower floret usually unawned
